<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Triple Threat](/Feats.aspx?ID=548) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 177 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Shared Prey](/Feats.aspx?ID=531)

</column>

---

You can divide your attention three ways when hunting. When you use Hunt Prey, you can designate three creatures as prey, designate two creatures as prey and share the effect with one ally (as Shared Prey), or designate one creature as prey and share the effect with two allies.
name: Triple Threat
